item.title: 美元主导地位稳固，金砖五国认为去美元化未取得进展--报道
item.description: 大西洋理事会地缘经济中心（Atlantic Council's GeoEconomics Center）的一项新研究显示，美元仍是世界主要储备货币，欧元和所谓的金砖国家都未能减少全球对美元的依赖。【原文：The U.S. dollar remains the world's primary reserve currency, and neither the euro nor the so-called BRICS countries have been able to reduce global reliance on the dollar, a new study by the Atlantic Council's GeoEconomics Center shows.】

item.title: 埃克森领导的圭亚那石油集团 2023 年净利润跃升，利润率居 Nvidia 之首
item.description: 政府数据显示，圭亚那去年与埃克森美孚为首的财团在南美国家签署的协议利润丰厚，为合作伙伴带来了 63.3 亿美元的收益，其净利润率超过了芯片制造商英伟达公司。【原文：Guyana's lucrative agreement with an Exxon Mobil-led consortium in the South American country last year generated $6.33 billion for the partners, government data showed, yielding a net margin larger than that of chip-maker Nvidia Corp.】

item.title: 中国敦促欧盟撤销对与俄罗斯有关联的中国企业的制裁
item.description: 中国周二敦促欧盟撤销对中国公司的制裁，因为欧盟认为中国公司支持了俄罗斯在乌克兰的战争。【原文：China on Tuesday urged the European Union to revoke sanctions on Chinese companies for what it believes is supporting Russia's war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 软银首席执行官孙正义连任的股东支持率降至 79
item.description: 周二的一份股市文件显示，在代理顾问机构股东服务公司（ISS）建议反对软银集团首席执行官孙正义连任后，股东对其连任的支持率从一年前的 95.93% 降至 79.22%。【原文：Shareholder support for the reappointment of SoftBank Group Chief Executive Masayoshi Son has fallen to 79.22% from 95.93% a year ago after proxy advisor Institutional Shareholder Services (ISS) recommended against his reappointment, a stock market filing showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 日本央行资深观察家警告：日元疲软将给日本家庭带来更多痛苦
item.description: 日本央行著名观察家加藤伊鹤（Izuru Kato）周二表示，日本家庭首当其冲地受到央行蜗牛般正常化宽松货币政策的影响，这给投资者提供了推低日元的绝佳借口。【原文：Japanese households are bearing the brunt of the central bank's snail-pace normalisation of loose monetary policy which is giving investors a perfect excuse to push down the yen, Izuru Kato, a prominent Bank of Japan watcher, said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，中国开发商世茂在清算听证会前增加了债务重组的优惠条件
item.description: 三位消息人士称，在中国房地产开发商竭力抵御向香港法院提交的清算申请之际，世茂集团为争取债权人的支持，提高了其离岸债务重组条件。【原文：Shimao Group has sweetened its offshore debt restructuring terms to garner support from creditors, said three sources, as the Chinese property developer scrambles to fend off a liquidation petition filed in a Hong Kong court.】

item.title: 文件显示，丰田在 2023/24 财年出售了价值 20 亿美元的交叉持有上市股票
item.description: 丰田汽车在本周二提交的一份监管文件中披露，在刚刚结束的一年中，丰田出售了价值 20 亿美元的上市公司交叉持股。【原文：Toyota sold $2 billion worth of cross shareholdings of listed companies in the year that just ended, the Japanese automaker disclosed in a regulatory filing on Tuesday.】

item.title: 诺和诺德减肥药Wegovy在中国获批上市
item.description: 诺和诺德（Novo Nordisk）公司周二表示，其广受欢迎的减肥药Wegovy已在中国获得批准，为在中国这个世界第二大经济体销售铺平了道路。【原文：Novo Nordisk said on Tuesday its popular weight-loss drug Wegovy has been approved in China, paving the way for sales in the world's second-largest economy.】

item.title: 印度启动价值 115 亿美元的频谱拍卖；分析师预计竞标乏善可陈
item.description: 印度在一份新闻稿中称，印度已提供价值约 9,623.8 亿卢比（约合 115.3 亿美元）的电信频谱供周二拍卖，尽管分析人士预计，由于各公司都在加强其现有频谱，因此参与度不高。【原文：India has offered telecom spectrum worth around 962.38 billion rupees ($11.53 billion) for auction on Tuesday, it said in a release, even as analysts expect lacklustre participation from players as they shore up their existing spectrum.】

item.title: 日本央行为鹰派双重惊喜敞开大门
item.description: 日本央行正在释放信号，表示其 7 月份的量化紧缩（QT）计划可能比市场想象的要大，甚至可能伴随着加息，因为日本央行正在加紧从其仍然庞大的货币刺激政策中稳步撤退。【原文：The Bank of Japan is dropping signals its quantitative tightening (QT) plan in July could be bigger than markets think, and may even be accompanied by an interest rate hike, as it steps up a steady retreat from its still-huge monetary stimulus.】

item.title: 欧陆集团否认做空者在股价暴跌后的指控
item.description: 欧陆集团周二否认了做空机构浑水公司（Muddy Waters）对其财务报告提出的指控，该指控使其股价在周一下跌了 16%。【原文：Eurofins on Tuesday denied allegations made by short seller Muddy Waters that questioned its financial reporting and sent its shares down 16% on Monday, adding it would provide a detailed list on the points raised in the report "in due course".】

item.title: 加密世界特朗普在纪念币中击败拜登
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）已经领先于乔-拜登（Joe Biden）--至少在政治纪念币的世界里是这样。【原文：Donald Trump has taken a commanding lead over Joe Biden - in the world of political meme coins, at least.】

item.title: 早间竞价：科技股溃败推动价值回归
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰（Kevin Buckland）展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天：【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland:】

item.title: 中国称其电动汽车和锂电池满足了国内需求，丰富了全球供应
item.description: 中国国务院总理李强在大连举行的世界经济论坛会议上告诉与会代表，在与西方国家贸易关系紧张的情况下，中国的绿色技术不仅满足了国内需求，还丰富了全球供应。【原文：China's Premier Li Qiang told delegates at a World Economic Forum meeting in Dalian the country's green technologies were not only meeting domestic demand but also enriching global supply, amid trade tensions with the West.】

item.title: 穆迪称水危机恶化可能影响印度主权信用实力
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）周二表示，印度在经济快速增长和自然灾害频发的情况下消耗大量水资源，由此引发的水资源短缺问题日益严重，可能会对这个南亚国家的主权信用实力产生负面影响。【原文：India's worsening water shortage, triggered by high consumption amid rapid economic growth and frequent natural disasters, can negatively impact the South Asian nation's sovereign credit strength, Moody's Ratings said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 印度将启动价值 115 亿美元的电信拍卖
item.description: 印度发布消息称，印度将于周二拍卖价值高达 9623.8 亿卢比（约合 115.3 亿美元）的电信频谱。【原文：India will auction telecom spectrum worth up to 962.38 billion rupees ($11.53 billion) on Tuesday, it said in a release.】

item.title: 韩国电池制造商为致命火灾道歉，但称遵守了安全规定
item.description: 韩国一家锂电池制造商的工厂发生大火，导致 23 名工人丧生，该公司首席执行官周二对此表示道歉，但称公司已遵守所有必要的安全预防措施和培训要求。【原文：The CEO of a South Korean lithium battery manufacturer apologised on Tuesday following a massive factory fire that killed 23 workers, but said the company had complied with all required safety precautions and training.】

item.title: 亚洲股市低迷，日元对欧元汇率创新低
item.description: 周二，亚洲股市低迷，日元兑欧元汇率创下历史新低，尽管干预风险阻止了日元兑美元进一步走软。【原文：Asian shares were subdued on Tuesday while the battered yen hit a record low versus the euro, although the risk of intervention stemmed further weakness against the U.S. dollar.】

item.title: 中国比亚迪在日本推出第三款电动车型
item.description: 中国比亚迪周二表示，该公司在日本推出了第三款电动汽车，这款轿车将是该公司迄今为止在日本市场推出的最昂贵车型，而日本消费者长期以来一直青睐本国品牌。【原文：China's BYD launched its third electric vehicle in Japan, it said on Tuesday, a sedan that will be its most expensive model so far in a market where consumers have long favoured domestic brands.】

item.title: 日本官员称将妥善应对日元过度波动
item.description: 日本内阁官房长官林芳正周二表示，当局将对过度的货币波动作出适当反应，这是在日元疲软逼近1美元兑160日元的关键水平之际发出的新警告。【原文：Japanese Chief Cabinet Secretary Yoshimasa Hayashi said on Tuesday authorities would respond appropriately to excessive currency volatility, in a fresh warning as the yen weakens towards to the key 160 per dollar level.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，波音提出以每小时 35 美元的价格收购 737 供应商 Spirit Aero
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一援引知情人士的话报道，波音公司已提出收购 Spirit AeroSystems Holdings 公司，交易资金主要来自股票，对其主要供应商的估值约为每股 35 美元。【原文：Boeing has offered to acquire Spirit AeroSystems Holdings in a deal funded mostly by stock that values its key supplier at about $35 per share, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 干预风险隐现，美元逼近 160 日元关键水平
item.description: 周二，受挫的日元在160美元附近徘徊，使交易商对日本当局为支撑日元而采取的任何干预措施保持高度警惕。【原文：The battered yen languished near the 160 per dollar level on Tuesday and kept traders on high alert for any intervention from Japanese authorities to prop up the currency, while the greenback edged a touch higher in the broader market.】

item.title: 市场权衡供应紧张和中国经济复苏，油价保持稳定
item.description: 由于对中国经济复苏前景的担忧抵消了中东紧张局势和乌克兰对俄罗斯炼油厂的袭击造成的供应担忧，周二油价变化不大。【原文：Oil prices were little changed on Tuesday as worries about China's economic recovery prospects offset supply concerns stemming from tensions in the Middle East and Ukrainian attacks on Russian refineries.】

item.title: 澳大利亚消费者平衡预算宽松与利率风险
item.description: 周二的一项调查显示，由于即将减税的承诺缓解了人们的情绪，澳大利亚消费者情绪在6月份小幅反弹，尽管借贷成本上升的风险仍隐约可见。【原文：Australian consumer sentiment rebounded modestly in June as the promise of imminent tax cuts lightened the mood, a survey showed on Tuesday, though the risk of yet higher borrowing costs loomed in the background.】

item.title: 日本 5 月份企业对企业服务通胀率达到 2.5
item.description: 本周二的数据显示，5月份日本企业之间相互收取的服务费用同比上涨了2.5%，这表明工资稳步增长的前景正促使更多企业转嫁更高的劳动力成本。【原文：The price Japanese companies charge each other for services rose 2.5% in May from a year earlier, data showed on Tuesday, a sign prospects of steady wage increases are prompting more companies to pass on higher labour costs.】

item.title: 独家报道美国就互联网和云计算风险调查中国电信和中国移动
item.description: 三位熟悉内情的消息人士称，拜登政府正在调查中国移动、中国电信和中国联通，因为担心这些公司可能通过其美国云计算和互联网业务向中国政府提供美国数据，从而利用这些数据。【原文：The Biden administration is investigating China Mobile, China Telecom and China Unicom over concerns the firms could exploit access to American data through their U.S. cloud and internet businesses by providing it to Beijing, three sources familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 普华永道称，"大辞职潮 "进入第三年，工人开始拥抱人工智能和提升技能
item.description: 普华永道对全球劳动力进行的一项调查发现，预计在未来 12 个月内更换雇主的工人比例高于 2022 年 "大辞职 "时期的比例。【原文：The proportion of workers who expect to switch employers in the next 12 months is higher than that from the "Great Resignation" period of 2022, a PwC survey of the global workforce found.】

item.title: 年中购物节失利，中国零售业前景黯淡
item.description: 在令人失望的年中网络购物节之后，中国的零售商面临着严峻的短期前景，这也给世界第二大经济体的复苏前景蒙上了阴影。【原文：Retailers in China face a daunting near-term future after a disappointing mid-year online shopping festival that has also clouded the recovery prospects of the world's second-largest economy.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，苹果公司与 Meta 公司目前尚未就人工智能合作事宜进行谈判
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一援引知情人士的话报道，苹果公司拒绝了 Meta Platforms 公司几个月前提出的将该社交网络公司的人工智能聊天机器人整合到 iPhone 中的请求。【原文：Apple has rejected overtures by Meta Platforms to integrate the social networking company's AI chatbot into the iPhone months ago, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美国单日航空旅客吞吐量达 299 万人次，创历史新高
item.description: 美国运输安全管理局（U.S. Transportation Security Administration）称，周日共检查了 299 万名航空公司乘客，创下单日最高纪录。【原文：The U.S. Transportation Security Administration said it had screened 2.99 million airline passengers on Sunday, the highest-ever number in a single day.】
